title: Comprehensive NFL Combine Statistics Tracking and Public Leaderboard

requirements.text: Expand the backend data model to track all standard NFL Combine statistics for each entry, ensuring every measurement and drill result is captured: 40-yard dash, bench press reps, vertical jump, broad jump, 3-cone drill, 20-yard shuttle, 60-yard shuttle, height, weight, arm length, hand size, and wingspan

quotes: Make sure the app tracks every single NFL combine statistic with every entry for every individual

acceptanceCriteria: Backend CombineEntry type includes fields for all standard NFL Combine measurements: 40-yard dash, bench press reps, vertical jump, broad jump, 3-cone drill, 20-yard shuttle, 60-yard shuttle, height, weight, arm length, hand size, and wingspan
All drill and measurement fields accept optional numeric values to accommodate partial entries
Existing entries are preserved and can be migrated to include new fields

requirements.text: Update the frontend CombineEntryForm to include input fields for all NFL Combine statistics: 40-yard dash, bench press reps, vertical jump, broad jump, 3-cone drill, 20-yard shuttle, 60-yard shuttle, height, weight, arm length, hand size, and wingspan with appropriate validation

quotes: Make sure the app tracks every single NFL combine statistic with every entry for every individual

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes labeled input fields for all standard NFL Combine drills and measurements
Each field validates numeric input within reasonable ranges for NFL Combine data
Form layout is organized logically grouping measurements and drills
All fields support optional entry so users can record partial combine results

requirements.text: Display all tracked NFL Combine statistics in the EntryDetail and PublicEntry views, showing every recorded measurement and drill result for the entry

quotes: Make sure the app tracks every single NFL combine statistic with every entry for every individual

acceptanceCriteria: EntryDetail page renders all available combine statistics for an entry
PublicEntry page renders all available combine statistics for public entries
Display includes clear labels and units for each measurement
Missing/optional fields are handled gracefully without breaking the layout

requirements.text: Enhance the Published page leaderboard to display usernames alongside each entry and rank all public entries numerically from best to worst based on the selected sorting metric

quotes: the public leaderboard (please make one) ranks all entries with usernames from best to worst in number rank

acceptanceCriteria: Published page displays username for each public combine entry in the leaderboard
Entries are ranked numerically (1, 2, 3, etc.) based on performance in the currently selected metric
Ranking updates dynamically when the user changes the sort metric
Best performers appear at rank 1, with descending ranks for lower performers
Entries without data for the selected metric are handled gracefully (e.g., shown at the bottom or excluded from that metric's ranking)

requirements.text: Update benchmark comparison logic to support all newly tracked NFL Combine statistics, providing performance level indicators (elite, above-average, average, below-average) for each drill and measurement
acceptanceCriteria: Benchmark thresholds are defined for all combine drills and measurements
BenchmarkComparison component displays appropriate performance levels for all tracked statistics
Benchmark data reflects realistic NFL Combine performance standards

requirements.text: Extend the guest mode localStorage implementation to support all newly tracked NFL Combine statistics, ensuring feature parity between authenticated and guest users
acceptanceCriteria: Guest users can record all NFL Combine statistics in localStorage
Guest entries include all new measurement and drill fields
Guest mode combines entries persist across sessions with full data integrity

constraints: Preserve existing backend data model structure and add new fields without breaking existing entries
Maintain compatibility with guest mode localStorage for all new statistics
Ensure username privacy controls remain functional for public entries
nonGoals: Adding historical NFL Combine data from professional athletes
Implementing social features like comments or likes on entries
